official_title: Breathing Techniques and Meditation for Health Care Workers During COVID-19
inclusion_criteria:
* Participants must be able to read and understand English
* Must be employed at MD Anderson Cancer Center
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Epilepsy
* Brain tumor
* Brain aneurysm
* Pregnant or trying to get pregnant
* Brain bleeding in the past 1 year
* Recent abdominal surgery and not cleared to exercise
